text:
No one is "dying" because the earth is 2 degrees warmer than it was 200 years ago.....  

The earth was supposed to apparently explode into a fireball in the year 2000 as a result of "global warming" (they renamed it to climate change because it was proved that warming temperatures would actually be a massively positive thing for the planet), instead of mass starvation and extinction we have in fact experienced.....

Agricultural yeilds skyrocketing. We produce vastly more food for less input than we did 25 years ago.

MASSIVE greening of semi-arid areas. Precisely the opposite of climate predictions, that said more land would become desert. Due to the increase of CO2 in the atmosphere, aka PLANT FOOD. Plant life is able to thrive in areas where it was once to hot and dry. Plants are able to draw in far more energy in a shorter amount of time, meaning they dont have to leave their pores open as long and lose moisture due to evaporation. 

The Great Barrier Reef in north easter Australia has not just made a complete recovery, but is thriving greater than ever before in recorded history. We no longer hear ANYTHING about it in the news anymore because its recovery is definitive evidence that climate "science" is nothing more than an ideology based on pagan nature worship.
